description:
Head to https://squarespace.com/eonsofbattle to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code eonsofbattle

Join as a Member to Get Terrain and Help Support the Show!
https://eonsofbattle.com/
T-Shirts, Dice and More Available!

In this video Jay talks about how he beats Hobby Burnout by going to events! He went to Dragonfall a few weeks ago and had a lot of fun! We have new videos every Monday, Wednesday and Friday!

Join as a Member to Get Terrain and Help Support the Show!
